Question: What are the locations and follower counts of users who mentioned me in tweets that contain the hashtag 'crypto' and were posted using the 'Twitter for iPhone' source?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)
MATCH (tweet)-[mentions:MENTIONS]->(me:Me)
MATCH (tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"crypto"})
MATCH (tweet)-[using:USING]->(source:Source {name:"Twitter for iPhone"})
RETURN user, posts, tweet, mentions, me, tags, hashtag, using, source, user.location, user.followers
Rewrite: Where are the users located and how many followers do they have who have tagged me in tweets with the 'crypto' hashtag and posted from the 'Twitter for iPhone' app?

Question: Can you identify the profile image urls of users who retweeted tweets that originally contained links to 'nytimes.com' and were tagged with 'worldnews'?
Cypher:
MATCH (originalTweet:Tweet)-[:CONTAINS]->(link:Link)
MATCH (retweet:Tweet)-[:RETWEETS]->(originalTweet)
MATCH (retweetUser:User)-[:POSTS]->(retweet)
MATCH (originalTweet)-[:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"worldnews"})
WHERE link.url CONTAINS 'nytimes.com'
RETURN originalTweet, link, retweet, retweetUser, hashtag, retweetUser.profile_image_url
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (originalTweet:Tweet)-[relation5:CONTAINS]->(link:Link)
MATCH (retweet:Tweet)-[relation6:RETWEETS]->(originalTweet)
MATCH (retweetUser:User)-[relation7:POSTS]->(retweet)
MATCH (originalTweet)-[relation8:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"worldnews"})
WHERE link.url CONTAINS 'nytimes.com'
RETURN relation8, relation7, relation6, relation5, originalTweet, link, retweet, retweetUser, hashtag, retweetUser.profile_image_url
Rewrite: Are you able to determine the profile image URLs of users who retweeted posts originally linking to 'nytimes.com' and tagged under 'worldnews'?

Question: List the screen names and URLs of users who follow users that have tweeted about me using tweets tagged with 'AI' and originating from 'Twitter Web App'.
Cypher:
MATCH (follower:User)-[follows:FOLLOWS]->(followed:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"AI"})
MATCH (tweet)-[using:USING]->(source:Source {name:"Twitter Web App"})
MATCH (tweet)-[mentions:MENTIONS]->(me:Me)
RETURN follower, follows, followed, posts, tweet, tags, hashtag, using, source, mentions, me, follower.screen_name, follower.url
Rewrite: Provide the usernames and links of followers of individuals who have posted tweets mentioning me, which are labeled with 'AI' and come from 'Twitter Web App'.

Question: Provide the names and locations of Me nodes that are followed by users who posted tweets containing the hashtag 'startup' and mentioning the user 'johndoe'.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"startup"})
MATCH (tweet)-[mentions:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User {screen_name:"johndoe"})
MATCH (user)-[:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me)
RETURN user, posts, tweet, tags, hashtag, mentions, mentionedUser, me, me.name, me.location
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"startup"})
MATCH (tweet)-[mentions:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User {screen_name:"johndoe"})
MATCH (user)-[relation8:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me)
RETURN relation8, user, posts, tweet, tags, hashtag, mentions, mentionedUser, me, me.name, me.location
Rewrite: List the names and locations of Me nodes that are tracked by users who have shared tweets with the hashtag 'startup' and referenced the user 'johndoe'.

Question: What are the screen names and profile images of Users who have retweeted posts containing the hashtag 'machinelearning' using tweets linked from 'github.com'?
Cypher:
MATCH (hashtag:Hashtag {name:"machinelearning"})<-[tags:TAGS]-(tweet:Tweet)-[contains:CONTAINS]->(link:Link {url:"github.com"})
MATCH (retweet:Tweet)-[retweets:RETWEETS]->(tweet)
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(retweet)
RETURN user, posts, retweet, retweets, tweet, tags, hashtag, contains, link, user.screen_name, user.profile_image_url
Rewrite: What are the usernames and display pictures of Users who retweeted messages that include the hashtag 'machinelearning' and contain links from 'github.com'?

Question: Show me the name and following count of Users who mentioned 'alice_smith' in tweets that tagged 'blockchain' and were sourced from 'Android App'.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[post:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[tag:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"blockchain"})
MATCH (tweet)-[mention:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User {screen_name:"alice_smith"})
MATCH (tweet)-[usingSource:USING]->(source:Source {name:"Android App"})
RETURN user, post, tweet, tag, hashtag, mention, mentionedUser, usingSource, source, user.name, user.following
Rewrite: Display the username and follower count of Users who referenced 'alice_smith' in tweets tagging 'blockchain' and originating from 'Android App'.

Question: What are the textual contents of original tweets, the sources used, and URLs in links for tweets that mention a user 'tom_clark' who follows me?
Cypher:
MATCH (mentionedUser:User {screen_name: 'tom_clark'})-[:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me)
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[mentions:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser)
MATCH (author:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet)
MATCH (tweet)-[using:USING]->(source:Source)
OPTIONAL MATCH (tweet)-[contains:CONTAINS]->(link:Link)
RETURN mentionedUser, me, tweet, mentions, author, posts, using, source, contains, link, tweet.text, source.name, link.url
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (mentionedUser:User {screen_name: 'tom_clark'})-[relation6:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me)
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[mentions:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser)
MATCH (author:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet)
MATCH (tweet)-[using:USING]->(source:Source)
OPTIONAL MATCH (tweet)-[contains:CONTAINS]->(link:Link)
RETURN relation6, mentionedUser, me, tweet, mentions, author, posts, using, source, contains, link, tweet.text, source.name, link.url
Rewrite: What are the text of the original tweets, the sources mentioned, and the URLs in links for tweets that reference a user 'tom_clark' who is a follower of mine?

Question: Can you provide the details of relations (mentions and retweets) between tweets containing the hashtag 'music' and original tweets by users located in 'New York'?
Cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[tag:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"music"})
MATCH (user:User {location:"New York"})-[post:POSTS]->(originalTweet:Tweet)
MATCH (tweet)-[mention:MENTIONS]->(user)
MATCH (tweet)-[retweet:RETWEETS]->(originalTweet)
RETURN tweet, tag, hashtag, user, post, originalTweet, mention, retweet, tweet.id, tweet.text, originalTweet.id, originalTweet.text
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (hashtag:Hashtag {name:"music"})<-[tags:TAGS]-(tweet:Tweet)-[mention:MENTIONS]->(originalTweet:Tweet)
MATCH (tweetOwner:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet)
MATCH (originalTweet)<-[originalPost:POSTS]-(originalUser:User {location:"New York"})
WHERE (tweet)-[relation9:RETWEETS]->(originalTweet) OR (originalTweet)-[relation10:RETWEETS]->(tweet)
RETURN relation10, relation9, hashtag, tags, tweet, mention, originalTweet, tweetOwner, posts, originalPost, originalUser, tweet.text, tweet.created_at, originalTweet.text, originalTweet.created_at
Rewrite: Could you supply information on the interactions (mentions and retweets) involving tweets with the 'music' hashtag and original tweets from users in 'New York'?

Question: List all tweets using 'Desktop Client', their hashtags, and details of follow relations between the authors of those tweets and me.
Cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[usingRel:USING]->(source:Source {name:'Desktop Client'})
MATCH (tweet)-[tagRel:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
MATCH (author:User)-[postRel:POSTS]->(tweet)
MATCH (author)-[followRel:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me)
RETURN tweet, usingRel, hashtag, tagRel, author, postRel, followRel, me, tweet.text, tweet.created_at, hashtag.name, author.screen_name, me.screen_name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[usingRel:USING]->(source:Source {name:'Desktop Client'})
MATCH (tweet)-[tagRel:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
MATCH (author:User)-[postRel:POSTS]->(tweet)
MATCH (author)-[followRel:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me)
RETURN source, tweet, usingRel, hashtag, tagRel, author, postRel, followRel, me, tweet.text, tweet.created_at, hashtag.name, author.screen_name, me.screen_name
Rewrite: Display every tweet made with 'Desktop Client', including their hashtags, and the information on follow connections between the tweet creators and myself.

Question: Retrieve the follower relations between me and other users, including mentions in tweets with 'sports' hashtag posted using 'Mobile Web'.
Cypher:
MATCH (me:Me)-[follow:FOLLOWS]->(user:User)
MATCH (me)-[post:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[tag:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"sports"})
MATCH (tweet)-[use:USING]->(source:Source {name:"Mobile Web"})
MATCH (tweet)-[mention:MENTIONS]->(user)
RETURN me, follow, user, post, tweet, tag, hashtag, use, source, mention, me.screen_name, user.screen_name
Rewrite: Fetch the following connections between me and other users, encompassing mentions in tweets tagged with 'sports' that were shared via 'Mobile Web'.

Question: Display the tweet texts that contain links to 'espn.com', who they reply to, and if those responded tweets have any mention of 'Usain Bolt'.
Cypher:
MATCH (initialTweet:Tweet)-[containsLink:CONTAINS]->(link:Link {url: "espn.com"})
MATCH (initialTweet)-[replyToRelation:REPLY_TO]->(respondedTweet:Tweet)
MATCH (respondedTweet)-[mentionsRelation:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User)
WHERE mentionedUser.name CONTAINS "Usain Bolt"
RETURN initialTweet, containsLink, link, replyToRelation, respondedTweet, mentionsRelation, mentionedUser, initialTweet.text
Rewrite: Show the text of tweets linking to 'espn.com', whom they are replying to, and whether the tweets they respond to mention 'Usain Bolt'.

Question: Identify the follow relations between users who retweeted my posts and the tweets' hashtags related to 'tech' where source is 'Twitter for iPad'.
Cypher:
MATCH (me:Me)-[myPost:POSTS]->(myTweet:Tweet)-[retweetRelation:RETWEETS]->(retweet:Tweet)<-[userPost:POSTS]-(retweetUser:User)
MATCH (retweet)-[tweetTag:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"tech"})
MATCH (myTweet)-[usingSource:USING]->(source:Source {name:"Twitter for iPad"})
MATCH (retweetUser)-[follows:FOLLOWS]->(followedUser:User)
RETURN retweetUser, userPost, retweet, retweetRelation, myTweet, myPost, me, tweetTag, hashtag, usingSource, source, follows, followedUser, retweetUser.screen_name, followedUser.screen_name
Semantic-EQL-Question: Identify the users who engaged with my "tech" tweets through retweets from their iPad and whom they are following currently.
Rewrite: Determine the relationships between users who retweeted my posts and the hashtags associated with 'tech' from those tweets originating from 'Twitter for iPad'.

Question: How many tweets tagged with 'holiday' have been posted by users following me and what is the total number of followers those users have?
Cypher:
MATCH (followingUser:User)-[:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me),
      (followingUser)-[:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE hashtag.name = 'holiday'
RETURN COUNT(tweet) AS TweetCount, SUM(followingUser.followers) AS TotalFollowers
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (followingUser:User)-[relation4:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me),
      (followingUser)-[relation5:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation6:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE hashtag.name = 'holiday'
RETURN COUNT(tweet) AS TweetCount, SUM(followingUser.followers) AS TotalFollowers
Rewrite: How many 'holiday'-tagged tweets have been made by users I follow, and what is the cumulative follower count of those users?

Question: What is the average number of likes on tweets that mention 'john_doe' and tagged 'competition' posted by users following more than 1000 people?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[mentions:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User), (tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE user.following > 1000 AND mentionedUser.screen_name = 'john_doe' AND hashtag.name = 'competition'
RETURN AVG(tweet.favorites)
Rewrite: What is the typical count of likes for tweets mentioning 'john_doe' with the tag 'competition' by users who follow over 1000 people?

Question: Find out the maximum number of followers among users who have retweeted tweets mentioning 'jane_doe' and tagged with 'travelTips'.
Calculate the total favorites received by tweets containing 'latestnews' hashtag, mentioned by users who follow me and have more than 500 followers.
Cypher:
MATCH (me:Me)<-[:FOLLOWS]-(follower:User)-[:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE hashtag.name="latestnews" AND follower.followers > 500
RETURN SUM(tweet.favorites)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (me:Me)<-[relation4:FOLLOWS]-(follower:User)-[relation5:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation6:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE hashtag.name="latestnews" AND follower.followers > 500
RETURN SUM(tweet.favorites)
Rewrite: Compute the sum of favorites for tweets with the 'latestnews' hashtag, posted by users following me who possess over 500 followers.

Question: Can you determine the average favorites counts for tweets mentioning 'Alex_123' under the 'science' hashtag by users with follower counts exceeding 2000?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User), 
      (tweet)-[:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE mentionedUser.screen_name = 'Alex_123' AND hashtag.name = 'science' AND user.followers > 2000
RETURN AVG(tweet.favorites)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation4:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation5:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User), 
      (tweet)-[relation6:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE mentionedUser.screen_name = 'Alex_123' AND hashtag.name = 'science' AND user.followers > 2000
RETURN AVG(tweet.favorites)
Rewrite: Can you calculate the mean number of favorites for tweets that reference 'Alex_123' and include the 'science' hashtag from users who have more than 2000 followers?

Question: Find the number of unique users who tweeted links from 'forbes.com', mentioned me, and tagged 'finance' in their tweets.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[post:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[contain:CONTAINS]->(link:Link), (tweet)-[mention:MENTIONS]->(me:Me), (tweet)-[tag:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE link.url CONTAINS 'forbes.com' AND hashtag.name = 'finance'
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT user)
Rewrite: Count how many distinct users have tweeted links from 'forbes.com', included my mention, and labeled their tweets with 'finance'.
